pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Dynamic Principal Components // Functions to compute the Generalized Dynamic Principal Components introduced in Pea and Yohai (2016) DOI:10.1080/01621459.2015.1072542. The implementation includes an automatic procedure proposed in Pea, Smucler and Yohai (2020) DOI:10.18637/jss.v092.c02 for the identification of both the number of lags to be used in the generalized dynamic principal components as well as the number of components required for a given reconstruction accuracy.
